attributes.action: To create legislation to provide Disabled Changing facilities in Public Conveniences
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In public toilets there are baby changing facilities and disabled toilets, but there is nowhere to change an older disabled child or adult who is incontinent and requires continence protection (e.g. Nappies)at the moment carers have a choice of either changing the person in the back of a car or on the floor of the toilet, which is degrading and undignified.
